name: War Piece
description:
A semi-autonomous robot is sent on an annihilation mission inside a giant alien base, by a mysterious organization. You decide how the robot will carry it's mission. Will it choose WAR, will it prove it's might and bring BALANCE, or find the missing PIECE and choose to lay down it's arms?

Controls:

  • W - up
  • S - down
  • A - left
  • D - right
  • Q - slow motion ability (HyperTime)
  • E - teleport ability (HyperSpace)
  • Mouse hover: aim
  • Left Mouse Button: shoot

Running game: extract files, open "War Piece.exe", enjoy

People who worked on this game:

  • Bratan Radu - designer, artist
  • Neagu Mario - programmer

Attributions for used assets:

  • ansimuz - Explosion Animations Pack, Industrial Parallax background
  • craftpix.net - Free Drones Asset Pack, Free Guns for Cyberpunk Characters 2
  • KenneyNL - Input Prompts Pixel 16x
  • NYKNCK - Pixel Explosion
  • Paul Timings (aka loadless) - Sci-fi SFX (Part 1)
  • Penusbmic - Sci-fi Character Pack 1, Sci-Fi Character Pack 8, Sci-fi Character Pack 9, Sci-fi Character Pack 10, Sci-fi Character Pack 12
  • Poppy Works - Silver Font
  • Pupkin - Tech Dungeon Roguelite
  • S a t u r n - Crosshair for your Shooter 2D Games
  • Shapeforms - Shapeforms Audio Free Sound Effects
  • somepx - Humble fonts (more specifically Equipment Pro)
  • Tim - Scifi Tactics SFX Bundle
  • VOiD1 Gaming - Free Sci-Fi Game Soundtracks

Complete attribution is provided inside the game files.

Originally created for the 2022 MGDP Game Jam.
